Program Description \n(guideline): Up to $90 for ENERGY STAR clothes dryers.
Rebate Value*: $30 for electric clothes dryers; $90 for heat pump clothes dryers
Other Restrictions: $30 per unit; $90 per vent-less heat pump unit

Program Description \n(guideline): Up to $350 per unit for induction cooktops measuring 30" or larger. New appliances only.
Other Restrictions:
$350/unit for gas-to-induction replacements or new constructions. $100/unit for electric-to-induction replacements.

Replacement of gas units with induction requires verification of old gas cooktop/range.

Program Description \n(guideline): Up to $50 rebate for WiFi-enabled Thermostat (for full amount, must be installed in a managed program)
Rebate Value*: $25 per thermostat, $50 if enrolled in managed program
Other Restrictions: $25 per thermostat, or $50 for thermostat if enrolled in a managed program. Managed programs include member system-led demand response control or time of use electric rate.
Stacking Details: Limit of 2 thermostats per member account for standard/low-voltage products and 5 thermostats per member account for line-voltage products.

Program Description \n(guideline): $100 rebate for Whole House Fan. Attic ventilation systems do not qualify. Limit 2 per member account.
Other Restrictions: Replacements or new installations. Attic ventilation systems do not qualify.

Program Description \n(guideline): $200 rebate per unit for minimum 2,500 CFM evaporative coolers. Replacements or new installations qualify. No window or portable units.
Up to $500 in weatherization products such as insulation, windows/doors, and sealing. Must be approved by local weatherization agency.
Rebate Value*: Up to $500 for electric heat source or up to $250 for non-electric heat source.
Other Restrictions: Weatherization products may include: insulation, windows/doors, caulking, sealing and weather-stripping. Tri-State will reimburse local weatherization agency approved installation measures up to $500 for electric heat source or $250 for non-electric heat source.

Program Description \n(guideline): $350 for ENERGY STAR-rated air source heat pump water heaters with 30 gallon minimum.
$16 per kilowatt (kW) for Electric Thermal Storage controlled by timer or master control system. Energy audit recommended.
Equipment Standards Restrictions: $16 per kW for ETS controlled by timer or master control system. $12 per kW for thermal slab units controlled by timer or master control units. Minimum qualifying load is 1 kW

Program Description \n(guideline): Up to $1,800 for qualifying Tier 1 (standard climate) Air Source Heat Pumps, capped at 50% of equipment cost.
Rebate Value*: 50% of equipment cost, capped at $675 for <=2 tons, or $1,800 for >2 tons
Equipment Standards Restrictions: SEER greater than or equal to 15, HSPF greater than or equal to 9
Stacking Details: Multiple air source heat pumps per acount require pre-approval.

Program Description \n(guideline): Up to $2,400 for qualifying Tier 2 Cold Climate Air Source Heat Pumps, capped at 50% of equipment cost.
Rebate Value*: 50% of equipment cost, capped at $1,000 for <=2 tons, or $2,400 for >2 tons
Bonus Description: $100 per unit additional for controlled ETS backup.
Equipment Standards Restrictions: SEER greater than or equal to 16, HSPF greater than or equal to 10, Variable speed 3 stage minimum
Stacking Details: Multiple air source heat pumps per acount require pre-approval.

Program Description \n(guideline): $450 per ton rebate for air-to-water heat pump units
Bonus Description: $100 per unit additional for controlled ETS backup.
Equipment Standards Restrictions: EER greater than or equal to 19, COP greater than or equal to 4

Program Description \n(guideline): $100 rebate for whole house fans for replacement or new installations. Rebates not issued for powered attic ventilators.
Other Restrictions: Rebates are not issued for powered attic ventilators

Program Description \n(guideline): $200 rebate per unit for minimum 2,500 CFM evaporative coolers. Replacements or new installations qualify. No window or portable units.

Technology*:
Electric lawn equipment 
(mower, edger, leaf blower, weedwhacker)
Program Description \n(guideline): 25% of cost up to $1,000 for electric riding mower
Other Restrictions: Rebate available for battery or corded equipment.
Stacking Details: One rebate per product type except E-bikes. Aggregated maximum rebate of $300 per member account, excluding riding lawnmowers).

Technology*:
Electric lawn equipment 
(mower, edger, leaf blower, weedwhacker)
Program Description \n(guideline): 25% of the cost up to $150 for single-stage snow blower, electric mower (walk-behind), or electric bicycle
Other Restrictions: Rebate available for battery or corded equipment.

Technology*:
Electric lawn equipment 
(mower, edger, leaf blower, weedwhacker)
Program Description \n(guideline): 25% of the cost up to $250 for a 2-stage snow blower
Other Restrictions: Rebate available for battery or corded equipment.

Technology*:
Electric lawn equipment 
(mower, edger, leaf blower, weedwhacker)
Program Description \n(guideline): 25% of cost up to $100 for electric chainsaws
Other Restrictions: Rebate available for battery or corded equipment.

Technology*:
Electric lawn equipment 
(mower, edger, leaf blower, weedwhacker)
Program Description \n(guideline): 25% of cost up to $50 for an electric trimmers, leaf blowers, and power-washers
Other Restrictions: Rebate available for battery or corded equipment.

Technology*:
Electric lawn equipment 
(mower, edger, leaf blower, weedwhacker)
Program Description \n(guideline): Additional Battery Rebate: 50% of the cost up to $25
Bonus Description: Batteries must be submitted with the original equipment rebate application
Other Restrictions: Rebate available for battery or corded equipment.

Program Description \n(guideline): 50% of total equipment and installation costs up to $500 for non-managed Level 2 Electric Vehicle chargers.
50% of total equipment and installation costs up to $1,000 for Managed Level 2 Electric Vehicle chargers.
Other Restrictions: Managed charager programs include member system-led demand response control or time of use electric rate.
Stacking Details: One rebate per installed charger; multiple charge ports do not qualify for multiple rebates.
